name: Pre-Kindergarten
description: Age Range: 4 years to 5 years Schedule: Monday - Friday: 8:30a - 1:30p (early care is available from 8:00a; after-school until 3:00 or 4:00p) The upper school classrooms, students begin preparation for kindergarten through play, exploration, and inquiry-based curriculum. Children strengthen their fine motor skills, learn letters with a multi-sensory approach, build pre-math concepts, gain confidence, and nurture a sense of curiosity. Pre-K families are supported throughout the entire kindergarte

howToGetIt: All the steps for admissions are located online at https://www.calvarynurseryschoolsf.org/admissions. For more information call or email office.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale is available with verified income requirements.
